content: now updated for additional sizes and better fit the harvest cardigan is that item in your closet that you will wear again and again because you love the way it feels so soft and comfy this easy-to-make cardigan features classic sweater ribbing on the bottom and cuffs for that familiar texture and pockets for all your important things this project uses basic stitches like single and double_crochet and can be customized for length the cardigan is meant to be relaxed and easy to wear without being oversized and the suggested yarn just gets softer every time it s washed you ll want to just live in this cardigan i hope you love it this pattern is written in standard us terms pattern is written in smallest size with larger sizes following in parentheses as follows xs s m l xl 2x 3x 4x 5x the featured cardigan is made with lion brand basic stitch anti-pilling #4 worsted weight 100% acrylic yarn and uses a us size j/10 6 00 mm crochet hook sample shown in russet heather 6 7 8 9 10 11 12 13 14 skeins approximately 1110 1295 1480 1665 1850 2035 2220 2405 2590 yards skill level - advanced beginner sizing/measurements - available in nine sizes fits chest measurement of the intended wearer 28-30 32-34 36-38 40-42 44-46 48-50 52-54 56-58 60-62 finished chest measurements of the finished garment 34 38 42 46 50 54 58 62 66 *this cardigan is intended to have a relaxed comfortable fit with 4-6 inches of positive ease in the main panels of the cardigan the cardigan can be customized in the length of the cardigan panels and sleeves *the cardigan pictured is a size small and the model is 5 10″ with a bust size of 34″ copyright/making finished items -
